title: Easy On Me
author: Adele
lyrics:
[00:12.97] There ain't no gold in this river
[00:19.55] That I've been washing my hands in forever
[00:26.49] I know there is hope in these waters
[00:33.18] But I can't bring myself to swim
[00:36.73] When I am drowning in this silence
[00:42.06] Baby, let me in
[00:46.70] Go easy on me, baby
[00:53.67] I was still a child
[00:56.98] Didn't get the chance to
[01:01.11] Feel the world around me
[01:06.77] I had no time to choose what I chose to do
[01:13.71] So, go easy on me
[01:20.34] 
[01:27.25] There ain't no room for our things to change
[01:34.04] When we are both so deeply stuck in our ways
[01:40.85] You can't deny how hard I've tried
[01:47.47] I changed who I was to put you both first
[01:52.97] But now I give up
[01:57.84] Go easy on me, baby
[02:04.57] I was still a child
[02:08.07] Didn't get the chance to
[02:11.88] Feel the world around me
[02:17.83] Had no time to choose what I chose to do
[02:24.63] So go easy on me
[02:36.31] 
[02:39.08] I had good intentions
[02:43.47] And the highest hopes
[02:47.22] But I know right nowã…¤
[02:49.77] It probably doesn't even show
[02:55.02] Go easy on me, baby
[03:02.06] I was still a child
[03:05.10] I didn't get the chance to
[03:09.57] Feel the world around me
[03:15.33] I had no time to choose what I chose to do
[03:22.06] So go easy on me
[03:26.04]
